overview: Macho guy Billy Slade is still getting over the death of his boyfriend and suffers from terrible nightmares. His flat-mates Spanish Stud Carlos and toned Luca try to help but they have their hands more than full with each other. When Billy's mysterious Uncle Henry leaves him a Chateau in France he decides to take three hunky friends on a well earned vacation. But as they arrive in France Billy discovers the chateau is in fact the dilapidated old dark house that he's seen in his dreams and something mysterious is watching them from the locked, shuttered attic on the top floor. Christian Marshall's most complex film so far "French Heat" utilizes nine super hot international models, and features threesomes, fivesomes, piston fucking, rimming, arseplay and spit play.
title: French Heat
